name: dispo-jack
description: A mockup dispensary app. Front end runs on React. Back end runs on Express.
author: Jack Hermanson

scripts.install: (cd client && yarn install) && (cd server && yarn install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm run start" "kill-port 5000 && cd server && PORT=5000 npm run start"
